column1: Commission Act No. 23 of 2011, as amended (hereinafter referred to as
‘the TAC Act’), against the determination of the CGIR.
The  TAC  made  its  determination  on  the  11th  June  2019  confirming  the
determination made by the CGIR and dismissed the appeal. The aggrieved
Appellant moved the TAC to state a case to this Court on the following
